summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5688 for the improvement of 52nd Avenue Southwest, from West Stevens Street to West Hanford Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75237, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
